response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the high quality and functionality of the product but also the potential long-term value it could bring to your business or personal endeavors. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 12000}
